Text:
Once again you show that you are the best uploader of paranormal shows. You get this stuff out there so quick and the quality is great.  Thanks a lot. I went on a bit of a rant against Ghost lab here a few weeks ago . And I shouldn't have. 

I've been watching it all this season and it's getting a lot better and the Kling brothers are still learning how to investigate in a style that doesn't upset to many people. I think they are just trying to play the good cop bad cop thing and trying to mimic Zak Bagans up front approach but came across as a bit to angry perhaps.

Could you please upload the latest Ghost lab that airs tonight I think. Thanks a million and keep up the great work.

I will upload episodes when I have the chance, so asking me to upload the next episode of any series is rather redundant.  

Some times it will be immediately posted, or other times it will take a while due to either encoding complications or my real life outside and away from the internet.

If you don't see any posts of a show from me at least a week after it was aired, consider me on vacation or retired.

Thanks for your support.
